Dispersion_Bubble.display_help: Creates a large bubble which protects all allies inside. While active, the Dispersion Bubble gives all allies within increased Defense against all attacks except Psionic. The Dispersion Bubble also protects allies from Immobilization, Disorient, and Hold effects. Recharge: Slow
Dispersion_Bubble.display_target_help: Creates a large bubble which protects all allies inside. While active, the Dispersion Bubble gives all allies within increased Defense against all attacks except Psionic. The Dispersion Bubble also protects allies from Immobilization, Disorient, and Hold effects. Recharge: Slow
Dispersion_Bubble.display_attacker_hit: You protect {PlayerDest} from most damage types with your {PowerName}.
Dispersion_Bubble.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} protects you from most damage types with a {PowerName}.

Protection_Shield.display_help: Dramatically protects an ally from Fire, Cold, Energy, and Negative Energy attacks for a limited time. Multiple shields from the same hero cannot be stacked; however, the shield can be improved when another hero uses the same power. Can also be used in conjunction with your Deflection Shield. You cannot use this power on yourself. Recharge: Very Fast
Protection_Shield.display_target_help: Dramatically protects an ally from Fire, Cold, Energy, and Negative Energy attacks for a limited time. Multiple shields from the same hero cannot be stacked; however, the shield can be improved when another hero uses the same power. Can also be used in conjunction with your Deflection Shield. You cannot use this power on yourself. Recharge: Very Fast
Protection_Shield.display_attacker_hit: You protect {PlayerDest} from fire and cold attacks with your {PowerName}.
Protection_Shield.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} protects you from fire and cold attacks with a {PowerName}.
